Description:
Expert Fittings: conduct precise fittings for clients to ensure perfect measurements and an impeccable fit for luxury evening wear garments.
Alterations and Customization: skillfully alter and customize designer gowns and outfits according to individual clients' requirements, ensuring a flawless finish.
Sewing and Embellishments: proficiently handle sewing machines and perform intricate embellishments, ensuring the utmost attention to detail and craftsmanship.
Pattern development: creating and developing new items patterns 
Fabric and Material Knowledge: possess extensive knowledge of luxury fabrics, textiles, and materials commonly used in evening wear, ensuring the ability to handle delicate and luxurious fabrics with care.
Quality Assurance: maintain the highest standards of quality and craftsmanship, ensuring all garments meet our boutique's exacting standards.
Time Management: efficiently manage workload and meet tight deadlines without compromising on the quality of work.
Client Interaction: communicate effectively with clients
Team Collaboration: work closely with the boutique's sales and customer service teams to ensure a seamless customer experience from selection to fitting.
Equipment Maintenance: take responsibility for the proper maintenance and care of sewing equipment and tools.
Professionalism: possess a professional and customer-focused attitude at all times and a genuine passion for luxury eveningwear and high-quality craftsmanship
Provide personalized bridal assistant service in collaboration with the Alteration Team.Skills
Skills:
Proven experience as a Tailor, Seamstress, or similar role, with a track record of garment construction and alterations.
Experience in evening wear, bridal and couture.
In-depth knowledge of garment patterns, fabric properties, and various sewing techniques.
Strong proficiency in hand-sewing and machine-sewing methods.
Excellent attention to detail and precision in tailoring tasks.
Ability to interpret and adjust garment patterns for various body types and styles.
Leadership and mentoring skills to guide and train junior tailors.

High degree of professionalism and commitment to delivering exceptional tailoring services.
